replies.msg:
Students will be asked to submit their draft to the plagiarism checking system, “Turnitin”, about two weeks before the deadline for submission of the final version of their draft. Students are allowed to submit their draft to “Turnitin” as many times as needed until they consider that there is no plagiarism in the report (i.e. All similarity scores for individual primary sources are less than 1%).
Btw 你地點諗都冇所謂既, 係我個department 嚴謹d姐
